                                                                               int discountRate,
                                                                               int taxRate)
        Parameters:
        shoppingCart - - shopping cart
        discountRate - - discount rate from 1 to 100 %
        taxRate - - tax rate from 1 to 100 %
        Returns:
        locked shopping cart with discount and taxes applied in the right order: firstly discount, then taxes

        Parameters:
        shoppingCart - - shopping cart
        Returns:
